folderPath.value:
@if(empty(dataset().EventTrigger),
concat(
    dataset().FolderType,
    '/',
    formatDateTime(utcNow(),'yyyy'),'/',
    formatDateTime(utcNow(),'MM'),'/',
    formatDateTime(utcNow(),'dd')
),
dataset().FolderType)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT L4_switch_type 
FROM dbo.vb_tbl_job a
JOIN dbo.vb_tbl_trigger b ON a.trigger_id = b.trigger_id
WHERE b.trigger_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.Trigger}'
